tool_description: API to scrap real time news from reliable news sources.
name: Climate Change Real Time News
title: Climate Change Real Time News

api_list.name: Get news from specific news sources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-real-time-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-real-time-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-real-time-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-real-time-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
